direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve converting a document from one format to another, with asString converting a W3C Document to a String and fromJsoup converting a jsoup Document to a W3C Document.
Both methods handle document conversion with similar control flows and exception handling, though they convert to different formats.
Both methods access and manipulate W3C Document objects, though for different purposes (serialization vs. XPath evaluation).
Both methods handle exceptions related to document processing and URL validation, respectively.

enhanced_by.reason: The W3C Document required by asString can be initialized using the fromJsoup method.
The convert method can be used to prepare the W3C Document before serialization in asString.
The XPath evaluation method can be used to verify the structure of the serialized document.
